message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think you'll really love it. Would you like to make an offer for it?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. However, I've got to make a profit on this one. I can do $110, but that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you consider $100? That's the lowest I can go.
I'm not sure I can go any lower, Bob. I've already sacrificed a bit on the price. I can do $112.50, but that's as low as I can go.
I understand your concerns, Alice, but I'm really close to walking away. Can you meet me at $105? That's my absolute limit.
I'm trying to find a sweet spot, Bob. I can do $108, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that.
I'm really close to giving up, Alice. Can you meet me at $106? That's my final offer.
I'm trying to meet you halfway, Bob. I can do $108, but I'm starting to think I should just move on if we can't agree on a price.

I'm really disappointed we couldn't come to an agreement, Alice. I think I've made it clear I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not willing to go any higher than $106. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to walk away and buy from John for $150.
